com.intercom.base

类 ContentUriUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intercom.base.ContentUriUtils

  • public abstract class ContentUriUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to access content URI schemes.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  ContentUriUtils.FileProviderUtil
      Provides functionality to translate a file into a content URI for use with a content provider.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法

      Check whether a content URI exists.

      Retrieve the MIME type for the content URI.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setFileProviderUtil

        public static void setFileProviderUtil(ContentUriUtils.FileProviderUtil util)

      • getContentUriFromFile

        public static android.net.Uri getContentUriFromFile(android.content.Context context,
                                                    java.io.File file)

      • openContentUriForRead

        public static int openContentUriForRead(android.content.Context context,
                                        java.lang.String uriString)
        Opens the content URI for reading, and returns the file descriptor to the caller. The caller is responsible for closing the file desciptor.
        参数:
        context - Context in interest
        uriString - the content URI to open
        返回:
        file desciptor upon success, or -1 otherwise.

      • contentUriExists

        public static boolean contentUriExists(android.content.Context context,
                                       java.lang.String uriString)
        Check whether a content URI exists.
        参数:
        context - Context in interest.
        uriString - the content URI to query.
        返回:
        true if the URI exists, or false otherwise.

      • getMimeType

        public static java.lang.String getMimeType(android.content.Context context,
                                           java.lang.String uriString)
        Retrieve the MIME type for the content URI.
        参数:
        context - Context in interest.
        uriString - the content URI to look up.
        返回:
        MIME type or null if the input params are empty or invalid.

      • getDisplayName

        public static java.lang.String getDisplayName(android.net.Uri uri,
                                              android.content.ContentResolver contentResolver,
                                              java.lang.String columnField)
        Method to resolve the display name of a content URI.
        参数:
        uri - the content URI to be resolved.
        contentResolver - the content resolver to query.
        columnField - the column field to query.
        返回:
        the display name of the @code uri if present in the database or an empty string otherwise.
